rdf:Description.dc:title: Resource development opportunities in Northern Alberta 1985
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Energy and Natural Resources. Resource Evaluation and Planning Division.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Energy and Natural Resources, Resource Evaluation and Planning Division,
rdf:Description.dc:description: This report identifies the opportunities for resource development in northern Alberta, in nine major categories, that are associated with public lands and are influenced by transportation.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Natural resources
